oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Partial letter that accompanied reparation claims by Dr. John Gannaway
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Dr. John Gannaway served as private in Co. A, 44th Tenn. Inf. Regt., CSA. The Union quartermaster in Murfreesboro gave the claims to his brother, R. B. Gannaway, who remained loyal to the Union, for forage at the family homestead in Rutherford County.
